item.title: Automated Driving
item.description: Here I will write a post about my thesis research. The report can be found here.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a data scientist with a background in transportation and urban planning and design. I am from the Netherlands ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡± and based in Helsinki, Finland ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡®. In my worklife and studies I have specialised myself in the relation of mobility and cities and I consider it my mission to understand their interaction through simulation, data science and design thinking. This means that I love to build advanced tools to study the complexity of cities, but also take on a creative, data driven and visual approach to urban planning problems, especially in the field of transportation.
